::Magmatron::

    Seeing what happened to Bazooka, he couldn't help but think that this was 
a chance ti make him smarter, and faster, and a totally new soldier.  He 
started to reprogram him into someone he read about, but under his control 
totally. His name would be CyberShark. And he would tear through what ever he 
had to complete his job.
    Soon CyberShark exited his birth place. He was very impressive, although 
still small compared to Magmatron. He looked like this:
[Unable to display image]
